title: Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers in an Ontology Subsection (or Profile)

fields.label: General Placement
General Title of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_title_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title of a fake subpage (or section) for providers in an area of expertise subsection [or profile]).

fields.label: General Intro Text of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_intro_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., intro text of a fake subpage (or section) for providers in an area of expertise subsection [or profile]).

fields.label: General Featured Image of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_featured_image_general
fields.instructions:
Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.

fields.label: General Title of the Reference to the Main Provider Archive on a Fake Subpage for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_ref_main_title_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages contain references linking users back to the main provider archive. This sets the title used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title in a reference to the main provider archive on a fake subpage for providers in an area of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Body Text of the Reference to the Main Provider Archive on a Fake Subpage for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_ref_main_intro_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages contain references linking users back to the main provider archive. This sets the body text used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default body text structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., body text in a reference to the main provider archive on a fake subpage for providers in an area of expertise subsection).
fields.placeholder: Discover our comprehensive list of [providers], spanning diverse specialties, who are dedicated to delivering exceptional care at UAMS Health.

fields.label: General Link Text of the Reference to the Main Provider Archive on a Fake Subpage for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_ref_main_link_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages contain references linking users back to the main provider archive. This sets the link text used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default link text structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., link text in a reference to the main provider archive on a fake subpage for providers in an area of expertise subsection).
